page.title: 18Castle Hill Hospital.
page.content: Castle Hill Hospital is not a General Hospital. All the wards are in separate buildings. Part of it is an isolation hospital and there is a day centre for old people from the surrounding district. It also deals with people disabled in accidents. It is well-known for helping patients with heart and lung complaints and people come to it for treatment from other areas apart from Humberside. There is not a castle on Castle Hill but there is a tower which is a folly. It stands on the hill behind the hospital.
